intro:
Coloring games and puzzles for kids!
Discover fun scenes and educational activities! A safe world that encourages logic and creativity.
description:
Puzzles & Colors is the perfect game for toddlers and young children aged 2 and up. An educational and relaxing adventure designed to spark creativity and guide little ones through a world full of colors, animals, and interactive fun.

In the full version, with over 500 puzzles and coloring pages, kids can explore exciting environments: mysterious jungles, deep oceans, prehistoric lands with dinosaurs, snowy landscapes, and much more. Every drawing is a new opportunity to learn, relax, and have fun in a safe and friendly space.
Two simple and intuitive control modes:

-Move the pointer by tilting the Joy-Con™ like a magic wand! Thanks to the motion sensor, children can color and solve puzzles in a natural and engaging way. Perfect for improving hand-eye coordination.

-Play using the touchscreen! Kids can tap and color with their fingers for a smooth, hands-on experience that’s ideal even for the youngest players.

Main features:

    -Dozens of different themes and settings
    -Creative tools like brushes, pencils, and stamps
    -Easy puzzles designed for young children
    -Interactive backgrounds and animal sounds
    -Constant updates with new content
    -Safe, ad-free gameplay experience
    -Designed for kids ages 2 to 7

A learning game made for early development:

    -Encourages creativity and imagination
    -Enhances fine motor skills
    -Supports sensory development
    -Promotes artistic expression
    -Encourages parent-child interaction

Included content and themes:

The free version includes 14 fun activities. You can expand the game with additional themed packs, including:

    -Farm animals
    -Sea animals
    -Jungle, forest, and savannah
    -Halloween
    -Christmas
    -Space
    -Dinosaurs
    -And many more coming soon

Puzzles & Colors is the perfect way to combine learning with play.
Give your child a safe and creative experience that grows with them.
